name: Incubator
description:
A short point and click adventure game made for the 6 weeks  Pixelles Incubator workshop (http://pixelles.ca/2018/03/play-the-games-pgi6/), in the process of learning how video games are made.

You play Ava who was selected to participate to the Incubator workshop. She's a geek who likes to spend a lot of time on her computer. You can explore the room and interact with objects, who knows what you will find...
